document.full_text: baseball hall of famer harmon killebrew, the brawny slugger who remains near the top of the career home runs list, said friday he is ending his battle with esophageal cancer and will live out the final days of his life in hospice care.
document.title: hall of famer harmon killebrew ends cancer fight
lines_and_colors: baseball hall of famer harmon killebrew, the brawny slugger who remains near the top of the career home runs list, said friday he is ending his battle with esophageal cancer and will live out the final days of his life in hospice care.
